history.proof: unfold swap. destruct (Nat.eq_dec i i) as [eq_ii | neq_i]. - hauto q: on depth: 3. - destruct (Nat.eq_dec i n) as [eq_in | neq_ni]. + rewrite eq_in. sfirstorder depth: 3. + destruct (Nat.eq_dec i j) as [eq_ij | neq_j]. * rewrite eq_ij. sfirstorder depth: 3. * destruct (Nat.eq_dec n j) as [eq_nj | neq_jn]. ++ rewrite eq_nj. sfirstorder depth: 3. ++ destruct (Nat.eq_dec n n) as [eq_nn | _]. ** sfirstorder depth: 3. ** contradiction.

original: unfold swap. rewrite swap_spec. destruct (Nat.eq_dec i i) as [eq_ii | neq_i]. - rewrite eq_ii. apply swap_spec; auto. - destruct (Nat.eq_dec i n) as [eq_in | neq_ni]. + rewrite eq_in. apply swap_spec; auto. + destruct (Nat.eq_dec i j) as [eq_ij | neq_j]. * rewrite eq_ij. apply swap_spec; auto. * destruct (Nat.eq_dec n j) as [eq_nj | neq_jn]. ++ rewrite eq_nj. apply swap_spec; auto. ++ destruct (Nat.eq_dec n n) as [eq_nn | _]. ** rewrite eq_nn. apply swap_spec; auto. ** contradiction.
